PackageOracle.name: DA_SCHEDULED_PROGRAM
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SCHEDULED_PROGRAM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.15.759031000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,scheduled_program_id IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_locator_id IN NUMBER
,title_id IN NUMBER
,program_utc_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,program_utc_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,local_time_zone_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,scheduled_program_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_scheduled_program;

body.name: DA_SCHEDULED_PROGRAM
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SCHEDULED_PROGRAM
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.15.769481000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,scheduled_program_id IN VARCHAR2
,linear_content_locator_id IN NUMBER
,title_id IN NUMBER
,program_utc_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,program_utc_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,local_time_zone_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_scheduled_program.add, parms=' || scheduled_program_id || '|' || linear_content_locator_id || '|' || title_id || '|' || program_utc_start_dttm || '|' || program_utc_end_dttm || '|' || local_time_zone_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_scheduled_program a
(
a.scheduled_program_id
,a.linear_content_locator_id
,a.title_id
,a.program_utc_start_dttm
,a.program_utc_end_dttm
,a.local_time_zone_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.scheduled_program_id
,add.linear_content_locator_id
,add.title_id
,add.program_utc_start_dttm
,add.program_utc_end_dttm
,add.local_time_zone_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_scheduled_program.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,scheduled_program_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_scheduled_program.del, parms=' || scheduled_program_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_scheduled_program a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.scheduled_program_id = del.scheduled_program_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_scheduled_program.del');

END del;

END da_scheduled_program;
